plays.text: Goal scored by Jeremy Roenick assisted by Dan McGillis and Justin Williams
Penalty to Chris McAllister 2 minutes for Tripping Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Jiri Fischer 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jan Hlavac
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Brett Hull
Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for Hooking Paul Ranheim
Penalty to Eric Weinrich 2 minutes for High Sticking Chris Chelios
Penalty to Brian Boucher 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified) served by Todd Fedoruk
Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Tripping Kent Manderville
Penalty to Nicklas Lidstrom 2 minutes for High Sticking Mark Recchi
Goal scored by Marty Murray assisted by Jeremy Roenick and Kim Johnsson
Penalty to Kim Johnsson 2 minutes for Crosschecking Boyd Devereaux
Penalty to John LeClair 2 minutes for Crosschecking Brent Gilchrist
Penalty to Eric Desjardins 2 minutes for Roughing Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for Roughing Eric Desjardins
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Brendan Shanahan and Kris Draper
Goal scored by Brett Hull assisted by Steve Yzerman
